reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operating the Emergency Center for Epidemic Disease Control in Hajjah Governorate (Phase II)

description.narrative: Full readiness of the laboratory unit in the emergency center for speedy diagnosis and provision of emergency health services to combat epidemics for (16,230) beneficiaries, (90%) of beneficiaries receiving their needs from therapeutic and diagnostic medicines, provision of therapeutic, preventive and diagnostic services to (16,230) beneficiaries, provision of treatment and isolation services For cases infected with epidemics, a field survey to investigate epidemics and their causes, and health education to prevent them, with lectures and workshops on health and preventive practices from diseases and epidemics, for (10,450) beneficiaries
Reducing the spread of diseases and epidemics and providing emergency health services to combat the epidemic and strengthening them for some districts of Hajjah Governorate

Saving life, maintaining its continuity, limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics, and securing emergency health services to combat the epidemic and strengthening them for some districts of Hajjah Governorate.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
